column4: Hrm, I haven't done that for a long time, _seanc_.  In fact SuSE's X was so screwed that is why I switched to Ubuntu.
no more screwing around with X :)
Okay I just tried to reinstall Netscape 7.02 as a normal user.  It installs as a normal user, but STILL won't open.
Is there a Netscape channel?
that is still around?
Yes?
I have Netscape 7.02 that I must get working on Linux.
And nobody here seems to know what the problem is.
sounds like you may have to run it in wine
if they dont have a linus version
they have a Linux version, I am running it, but it will only run as root.
change the permissions
!permissions
I installed it as a normal user.  I also did chmod 777 netscape7 -R
see the links above
I have already done this.
then thats all i know
I have chmod 777 netscape7 -R
it should work under user
yes it should, that is why I need help.
is there a usergroup for it?
Netscape?  No there isn't.
Maybe I should just run as root.
sorry i couldnt think of anything else :(
